title: Peter Pan and Wendy Was Always Doomed
description:
Disney Plus's new Peter Pan & Wendy isn't very good, but it was facing a steep uphill climb from the very start. In this video, I go over director David Lowery's latest film, from Captain Hook to Tinker Bell, and why I don't think it works.
Music by Epidemic Sound (http://www.epidemicsound.com)
